00117   static void downcaseString(std::string &s) {
00118     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
00119       s[i] = tolower(s[i]);

00262   static void trimString(std::string& s, const char *whitespace  = " \r\n\t") {
00263     s = s.erase(s.find_last_not_of(whitespace)+1);
00264     s = s.erase(0,s.find_first_not_of(whitespace));
00265   }

00315   static void subChar(std::string &s, char from, char to) {
00316     std::string::size_type pos = 0;
00317     for(pos = 0; pos < s.size(); pos++) {
00318       if(s[pos] == from) {
00319         s[pos] = to;
00320       }
00321     }
00322   }
